headline: Staying invested long-term can secure your retirement
summary: Recent market volatility has caused concern among investors, especially those planning for retirement. JPMorgan Asset Management chief retirement strategist Michael Conrath joins Wealth host Brad Smith to share insights from JPMorgan's (JPM) 2025 Guide to Retirement, emphasizing the importance of staying invested long-term. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here.
